com.foreach.across.test

Class AcrossTestContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.test.AcrossTestContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcrossTestWebContext

    public class AcrossTestContext
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Creates and bootstraps a new AcrossContext instance using the configurers passed in as constructor parameters. The default test datasource is used and no default modules are added to the context.

    The test context provides methods for easy querying of an AcrossContext and its modules.

    Note: when finished with an AcrossTestContext it is important that the close() method is called. To make this easier this class implements Closeable.

    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    AcrossTestWebContext, AcrossTestConfiguration
